Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Establishes the "winter moratorium evictions act"
Summary: Establishes the "winter moratorium on evictions act" to prohibit eviction of tenants from residential properties during the winter months.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law and the real property law, in relation to prohibiting residential evictions during the winter months
